mean_cn: adj.明智的，理智的；可觉察的
mean_en: (of people and their behaviour) able to make good judgements based on reason and experience rather than emotion; practical
sentence: It\u0027s a sensible choice to take only a few things when going climbing.
sentence_trans: 轻装上阵去爬山是一个明智的选择。
word_etyma: sens感觉 + ible形容词后缀，能…的 → sensible能感觉的，明智的
